testcaseName: Patient is administered Novavax Covid-19 vaccine as a first dose, Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine as a second dose and Pfizer Bivalent as third dose

administeredDoses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)
COVID-19, mRNA, LNP-S, bivalent booster, PF, 30 mcg/0.3 mL dose

doses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)
COVID-19, mRNA, LNP-S, bivalent booster, PF, 30 mcg/0.3 mL dose

generalDescription: This test case describes when an adult is administered Novavax Covid-19 vaccine as the first dose, Pfizer's Covid-19, as a  second dose, and Pfizer's bivalent booster vaccine as the third dose, that the doses are valid.  Series is complete.  Patient is up to date.
